message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. Can you meet me at that price?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $16500.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $14500 for the product. Can you consider that?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer the product to you for $16000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $15500. Can you consider that?
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob. I'll meet you at $16200, but that's as low as I can go. This is my final offer.
